entities.name: Elon Musk
entities.description: Elon Musk is a business magnate and investor. He is the founder of SpaceX and Tesla, among other ventures.

entities.name: Microsoft Corporation
entities.description: Microsoft Corporation is a multinational technology company that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells software, electronics, and computers.

entities.name: New York City
entities.description: New York City, often simply called New York, is the most populous city in the United States, known for its financial, cultural, and entertainment industries.

entities.name: Artificial Intelligence
entities.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to think and learn.

entities.name: The Louvre
entities.description: The Louvre is the world's largest art museum and a historic monument in Paris, France, known for housing the Mona Lisa.
